servinfo.title: DTC C1015: G Sensor Circuit Failure (4WD Model)
servinfo.ptxt: For vehicle equipped with ESP®, go to DTC C1015 / C1017 / C1023: Longitudinal G Sensor / Lateral G Sensor / Yaw Rate Sensor in Yaw Rate / G Sensor Assembly Failure .

servinfosub.title: Description
servinfosub.ptxt: If the signal voltage of G sensor while at a stop does not vary from that while running, this DTC is set. (for 4WD vehicle)
Therefore, this DTC may be set when a vehicle is lifted up and its wheel(s) is turned. In such case, clear the DTC and check again.

s1.ptxt: Check for proper connection from harness to control module.
If OK, substitute an ABS hydraulic unit/control module assembly with correct part number.
